name: "Endless Ruins" - Soundtrack
metadata:
{"name": ""Endless Ruins" - Soundtrack 1/80", "description": "Hi! Ib�m Nick, Ib�m a sound-designer and composer. i primary work with sound effects for audiovisual media and this is my first cinematic soundtrack on Web3.0. I've always been inspired by modern music composers like Lugwig Ludwig Forssel or Zimmer and other cool guys.
In the process of writing this track i designed all synth sounds from scratch on my analog synthesizers and added a bit of organic ambiences. I wanted it to sounds warm, simple and tense and by hearing this track you can see how music tells you a story, your own story.

Join my twitter to be in touch:
https://twitter.com/kolyakolis

Soon i will drop much more music and bonuses for holders of this NFT.  

Also you can listen to this track on Audius:
https://audius.co/kolyakolis/endless-ruins

Enjoy!", "image": "ipfs://bafybeiabv6vl7hmgy355wg7kpt3o7sciznjknyhgoyhfusbwgmmtfk3y4a", "animation_url": "ipfs://bafybeigshzl2gu2p5dpa7o3tddfqkusofqmzdmn7ly6gmeiurmq5ybombe", "properties": {"number": 1, "name": ""Endless Ruins" - Soundtrack"}}
